dialogue: Click here to get a verification code by email.
Nice try. I know you won't send me a code. You never send a code.
This time I really will, I promise.
No, you won't. I will sit here checking my inbox over and over, and it will never come.
Check your spam and junk folders.
I always check my spam and junk folders!!! It is never there!!!
This time it will be. I promise.
